intro.p: Queries trophies for players or coaches from the Football API.

This node accepts output from either a Players or Coaches node and automatically queries trophies for all individuals in the input table. The node detects whether the input is from a Players or Coaches node by checking for Player_ID or Coach_ID columns and uses the appropriate API parameter.
Usage: Connect a Players or Coaches node to the third input port. The node will process all players/coaches from the input and return their trophy history.
Output: Each row represents one trophy won by a player or coach, including the league, country, season, and placement (e.g., "Winner", "2nd Place").

ports.inPort: Table from Players or Coaches node
ports.outPort: Trophies data table with columns: Person_ID, Person_Name, League, Country, Season, Place
